lead_paragraph: As part of an effort to end chronic tardiness, several federal offices in the capital, Abuja, locked out hundreds of who arrived after the 8 a.m. start time.
snippet: As part of an effort to end chronic tardiness, several federal offices in the capital, Abuja, locked out hundreds of who arrived after the 8 a.m. start time.

headline.main: Nigeria: Locked Doors Greet Those Late to Work
headline.print_headline: Nigeria: Locked Doors Greet Those Late To Work
